title: Support main playing "flex queue"
body:
Can you imagine how frustrating it being a (higher than average elo?) support main right now in flex queue given that on average, the players we're supporting are so much worse than we're used to? It's no wonder nobody's wanting to queue up as support. I haven't personally had it SUPER bad, as I can imagine it could be much worse, but how is going from supporting in plat 3 games to supporting bronze and silver players a thing? There's so much variation in skill levels at the moment that playing support isn't feasible given it's a lucky dip to who you'll play with and have to rely on. I've had bronze players on my team consistently. I'm only imagining Challenger support mains having to support a silver ADC's whilst queuing up in flex right now, expecting to be in lane with people their skill. 

Other roles I wouldn't expect to mind so much as there's fun to be had with more mechanical plays and dumpstering kids, but when you're support and _have to rely on people for the majority of the game_ on average who are a lot worse than you, consistently, it's pretty disheartening. Feelsrealbadman.

replies.body:
Totally agree.  

Riot needs to put bias on support roles in lower MMR as the chances of having an affect on your team is lower than at ~high gold/low plat. I can have real impact on the game and win a lot easier in Plat that at the lower end because as you say - players have a clue and support is taken seriously by the team.

This flex thing is totally messed up.  I got placed into bronze (down from plat), then proceed to win 16 straight games to move back into Silver.
Now I have this bullshit "1 more game to get real rank", and I win it and "You are now Bronze 2".

Seriously? I got penalised......FOR PLAYING WELL... AS SUPPORT!

The data science team needs to work with program design - because the system is TOTALLY FLAWED.

What we need is a support players union!

Power to the people!

Seriously though hahahaha sounds like you got worked over real bad by the system :)

No that was everyone, they fixed the MMR (sort of) and made us redo a game to check.

Pretty sure it's still fucked mind you.
